import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

dp = [0] * n
dp[0] = 0
dp[1] = abs(a[1] - a[0])

for i in range(2, n):
    dp[i] = min(dp[i - 1] + abs(a[i] - a[i - 1]), dp[i - 2] + abs(a[i] - a[i - 2]))

print(dp[n - 1])

n = int(input())
p = list(map(int, input().split()))

count = 0
for i in range(1, n - 1):
    if p[i - 1] < p[i] < p[i + 1] or p[i + 1] < p[i] < p[i - 1]:
        count += 1
print(count)
